author: Umaii
post_text: March 5, 2019 at 3:04 AM#1Hay,I have a row of 12 fixtures and i'm trying to do a macro for select fixtures with a wing of 2 and be able to move the pan with align >< without taping align each time. I saw someone use a macro like that but I can't find the good way to create it.Any ideas?
title: Wing 2 align ><
